attributes.action: Change the way CSA money is calculated.
attributes.additional_details:
I want the Government to change this because at moment it doesn't take the fact in to account that the parent doesn't have this money after paying Tax and National Insurance if the child live with them so how can they expect you to pay more when child doesn't even live with them. 

This leave many parents struggling to avoid to be able to support themselves and family and paying bills etc.
attributes.background: Change the way CSA money is calculated so it's after Tax and National Insurance and comes out from Net pay to be inline with if the Child live with the parent this would be what we have affordability wise to live on.
